item.title: Dido - Here With Me
item.description:
I didn’t
hear you leave
I wonder how am
I still here
I didn’t want to
move a thing
It might change
my memory
Ooh I am what I am
I’ll do what I want
But I can’t hide
I won’t go
I won’t sleep
I can’t breathe
Until you’re resting
here with me
I won’t leave
I can’t hide
I cannot be
until you’re resting
Here with me
I don’t want to
Call my friends
they might wake me
From this dream
and I can’t
Leave this bed
risk forgetting
All that’s been
ooh I am what I am
I’ll do what I want
but I can’t hide
I won’t go
I won’t sleep
I can’t breathe
until you’re resting
Here with me
I won’t leave
I can’t hide
I cannot be
Until you’re
resting here
I won’t go
I won’t sleep
I can’t breathe
until you’re resting
Here with me
I won’t leave
I can’t hide
I cannot be
Until you’re resting
here with me
Ooh I am what I am
I’ll do what I want
But I can’t hide
I won’t go
I won’t sleep
I can’t breathe
Until you’re resting
here with me
I won’t leave
I can’t hide
I cannot be
until you’re resting
Here I won’t go
I won’t sleep
I can’t breathe
until you’re resting
Here with me
I won’t leave
I can’t hide
I cannot be
Until you’re resting
here with me-
